alert.note: Alert for Barton; Jasper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 12:03AM CDT until April 11 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHEROKEE...SOUTHEASTERN BARTON AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 1202 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Jasper to near Galena, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. Reported Quarter Size hail near the city of Neutral Kansas. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Joplin... Carthage... Webb City... Carl Junction... Lamar... Baxter Springs... Galena... Oronogo... Carterville... Duquesne... Duenweg... Jasper... Airport Drive... Lowell... Alba... Purcell... Nashville... Carytown... Fidelity... Asbury... This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 near mile marker 0, and between mile markers 10 and 17. Interstate 49 between mile markers 36 and 64. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
